prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Research Notes on Edgar Allan Poe, Accession # 6453-i, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was an archival transfer on August 9, 1994.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: There are fourteen items in this collection, 1956 and n.d., consisting of research notes and a bibliography on Edgar Allan Poe, compiled by James Southall Wilson. The bibliography is enclosed with a letter, June 28, 1956, from "Dudley," Office of the Dean of the Graduate School at the University of Mississippi, and contains Poe material in that library.
